data.text: Mayɛ mmɔbɔ!
Moapra Nyamefɛrefoɔ nyinaa afiri asase so.
Nsa mmienu no nyinaa akokwa bɔneyɛ mu;
Deɛ ɔyɛ wɔ wɔn mu no te sɛ hwerɛmo;
Nnye obiara nni;
Ɔbabarima twiri nʼagya,
Me deɛ, mede anidasoɔ hwɛ Awurade,
Mma wʼani nnye, me ɔtamfoɔ!
Sɛ mayɛ bɔne atia no enti,
Afei, mʼatamfoɔ bɛhunu
Ɛda a wɔbɛto wʼafasuo no bɛba,
Ɛda no, nnipa bɛba wo nkyɛn
Asase no bɛyɛ amanfo ɛsiane nnipa a wɔtete so
Fa wo poma di wo nkurɔfoɔ anim,
“Mɛyɛ anwanwadeɛ akyerɛ wo,
Aman bɛhunu wo na wɔn ani bɛwu,
Wɔbɛdi dɔteɛ sɛ awɔ,
Hwan na ɔte sɛ wo,
Wobɛhunu yɛn mmɔbɔ bio,
Wobɛyɛ nokwafoɔ ama Yakob
